DOC.brief_summary: This study aim evaluate effect SLN mapping compare conventional radical PL incidence severity lymphedema woman early stage cervical endometrial cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Sentinel Node Mapping Women With Cervical Endometrial Cancer
DOC.criteria: Study IA : Cervical carcinoma , FIGO stage IB1 , cervical tumour size < 2 cm Study IB : Endometrial adenocarcinoma , presume FIGO stage I , low intermediate risk : Type 1 grade 1 + 2 , > 50 % myometrial invasion Prior PL Known allergy towards ICG and/or iodine ( ICG contain 5 % sodium iodine ) Women include study affect outcomemeasures present study
